title: Hereâ€™s our first look at Pixel phone display mirroring on Chromebooks
content:
Google has been working behind the scenes for at least a year on a feature that would allow apps on your phone to be streamed to a Chromebook, similar to what is possible with Microsoft’s Your Phone service on Windows PCs or wireless Samsung DeX. Now we have our first look at the feature running,

The post Here’s our first look at Pixel phone display mirroring on Chromebooks appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A new report shows off how Pixel phones will be able to mirror their screens to Chromebooks, and it might come to Windows, Mac, and Linux.
